body_html:
Yes, this is me experimenting with pytest for two reasons:

  1. It lets you regex for tests to run, which is really helpful if you're just working on convolution and want to test only Conv tests

  2. In an issue/PR I cannot find anymore, people were wondering if we couldn't have CI run all tests before quitting, instead of quitting on first failure. pytest will do this for you.

Yes, this is me experimenting with pytest for two reasons:

1. It lets you regex for tests to run, which is really helpful if you're just working on convolution and want to test only Conv tests

2. In an issue/PR I cannot find anymore, people were wondering if we couldn't have CI run all tests before quitting, instead of quitting on first failure. pytest will do this for you.
